text: Truong hop nguoi phu nu so nguoi chong oi xu te bac hoac bo roi thi hai ben khong co toi neu chiu hoa giai voi nhau va viec hoa giai luon la ieu tot. Qua that, long tham va ich ky a ton tai trong ban than cua moi nguoi. Tuy nhien, neu cac nguoi lam tot va ngoan ao thi qua that Allah thong toan tat ca nhung gi cac nguoi lam
